title: Aa! Megami-sama! (TV) Specials
opening_song: "Open Your Mind ~Chiisana Hane Hirogete~ (OPEN YOUR MIND 〜小さな羽根ひろげて〜)" by Yoko Ishida
sinopse: Due to the recent events that happened on the last episodes of the season, the Goddess have some stability problems with their body systems. The always adult looking Urd becomes a little girl and has a fateful encounter with a boy, whereas little Skuld becomes an adult and wants to experiment adulthood together with Keiichi.
